tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 An environmental disaster! Shut the place down immediately!
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 More toxins from that place, unacceptable, we are sick of their pollution ruining our lives.

@EnvAgencyMids @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 The Environment Agency responding to community concerns ?   Cool.   Keep it up guys.   Don‚Äôt tell us it‚Äôs just a fresh water pipe.   One of us has tested it for ammonia, and it stinks.
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Dnt make out like it‚Äôs just a water pipe leaking near the site, it‚Äôs pipe in the site absolutely gushing with god knows what in to all the brooks near by.....
What‚Äôs in the water? Why haven‚Äôt you seen it? How long has it been like that?  @RedIndustries2   Why you so quite as usual... https://t.co/sVtp55lyhj
@lisegirl1 @EnvAgency Also I know it's regrettable when scrub is removed but I'd rather this was removed than they took out saltmarsh any day of the week.

@PHE_uk the health issues keep mounting...I know @EnvAgencyMids have requested your involvement with the issues,what‚Äôs the plan #/timelines for your report?After another breach it appears today @RedIndustries2 time is of the essence!!! People are sick @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/kLfEDrXZ2f

This shameful. Hear me? Shameful !
@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK https://t.co/ZcLzb0aabh
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 1st time for everything I suppose
@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 The smell isn't a water discharge. It's the rotting waste that isn't being managed correctly.

@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 Get on it like a dozer bonnet.
But there's a whole lot more to be done - start digging  - I'll give you a few  clues -  1. The landfill. 
2 - Stop the stink group 
3 - Adam Share - well known crook. 
4 - Toxic gas cloud
@RebelScumn @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Who are 'they'?
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Shut it down! This is unacceptable

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Close it down. You are getting enough RED flags, how much will this cost the EA in the future when they find somebodys death was caused by this landfill and you did nothing. !!!! Act now please.
@EnvAgencyMids Did you also manage to check this?  https://t.co/OnjRDVKbk2
@Sian29337182 @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 looks similar doesn't it  https://t.co/qIu8x0gDIZ

@lisegirl1 @EnvAgency This is way more than offsetting. This looks to be a significant ecological long term benefit unless I've missed something and follows on from what EA did at Steart. I would generally trust the EA to get it right on flood risk and mitigation.

Thank you @EnvAgencyMids for attending. @NewsNBC officers were also in attendance and we look forward to receive a report from both authorities on this latest incident. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/qUi6HW0VmM https://t.co/FUosuUFU3q
@markeltro @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Have they said so?
@Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 This is a health scandal
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Thank you ... and actually it is about bloody time !!! This place is a health hazard and a scandal.

@Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @LiamDeacon @GBNEWS @SOPH_C_ @Sotlive @BBCRadioStoke @ITVCentral @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Need more detail on this, was any treatment prescribed? Will the doctors take action on her behalf?

tweets.text: Thank you to the community of #Silverdale, Newcastle-under-Lyme for reporting a water pipe discharging near #WalleysQuarry landfill. Our officers are attending the @RedIndustries2 site to investigate.

The radius for the fumes is huge now, 5 miles to Longton, 5 miles to Whitmore Heath & 5 miles to Audley yet no one at @EnvAgency @PHE_uk are saying this is a problem? Send an exec to the site. Take one look at the size of it & tell me it‚Äôs not a problem @StinkStopthe CAP IT OFF https://t.co/TpuxgX0b4F

@Sian29337182 @scottdegg @StinkStopthe @NUL_Labour @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk @pow_rebecca @DHSCgovuk Same again last night, our bodies know it's poison hats why we can't sleep through it, can't breathe, feel sick & have headaches, evenRussia evacuated people in Chernobyl, I ask where I can go to breathe clean air safely every time I ring, they don't answer.

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids, according to the video released by @StinkStopthe, and the subsequent sampling indicating the presence of ammonia, it looks like an uncontrolled release of leachate contaminated material. Please hurry. https://t.co/XC8eddPLfm
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Please investigate it thoroughly and if it‚Äôs a breach deal with it properly it‚Äôs all we want #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Thanks @EnvAgencyMids for responding so well and so fast to our concerns. It was nice to bump into some of your officers who were really friendly and engaging and included a senior manager.üëçüëç

Absolutely horrified to say the least. A young girl is poorly and had hydrogen sulphide detected in her urine. Also a leak from a pipe that's very visible on the site. So Red how are you going try cover this up then.
@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids

The state of the River Lea is a disgrace, as volunteers we can only clear up so much but why do we have to? When will the @EnvAgencySE step in and stop this scandal? @HackneyAbbott @Meg_HillierMP @SAS_London_ @sascampaigns @SaveLeaMarshes @itsanitarani @CanalRiverTrust https://t.co/iULKnoOauI

tweets.text: @MigrationMatt @EnvAgency I sent the attachment as part of the chain. I don‚Äôt think offsetting fixes this that‚Äôs all. It will take 2 decades to repair what‚Äôs been removed here. For a flood bank we don‚Äôt need. In my view.

@julian_kirby @CraigBennett3 @GeorgeMonbiot @WildLondon @HughFW @lizbonnin @RichMcToffee @GPUKnews 6 of us took this out of 100 yard over 3 sessions. It's got lots of sanitary waste as well a plastic, tarps, and other debris. @EnvAgencySE @thameswater @CRTContactUs all contacted!. Even read recently inspectors saw no sign of sewage!! I can supply new glasses  next time. https://t.co/NjbSbNpu6N

How is this not a major incident now @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @BorisJohnson ? The residents having to turn Erin Brokovic because no one is listening!! We will continue to shout until you take heed! @StinkStopthe https://t.co/5qG3bfb45i
